howItWorks.title: Enter Prompt or Upload Image
howItWorks.description: Choose whether to type a video idea or upload a picture to animate.

howItWorks.title: Select Style and Aspect Ratio
howItWorks.description: Customize the animation using cinematic, ghibli, or pixel styles and choose video format.

howItWorks.title: Generate and Download MP4
howItWorks.description: Click Generate and wait a few seconds. Your AI video will be ready to save and share.

faq.question: Is this AI video generator free?
faq.answer: Yes, OneAIKit provides a 100% free AI video generation tool. No credit card or login required.

faq.question: Can I generate video from both text and image?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can generate videos from text prompts or image uploads with optional style descriptions.

faq.question: Are the generated videos watermarked?
faq.answer: No. All videos generated using this tool are free of watermarks and can be used commercially.

faq.question: Do I need to install any app?
faq.answer: No installation is required. Everything runs in your browser for instant AI video generation.

faq.question: What models are used for video generation?
faq.answer: We support Kling AI for text-to-video and Stability AI for image-to-video generation with realistic motion.

faq.question: Can I use this AI video generator for YouTube or TikTok content?
faq.answer: Yes. Our tool supports formats suitable for social media, short-form content, and creative storytelling.
